title: Introducing: Abe
body:
Sheffield based band **Abe** just dropped their debut EP, the mysteriously titled_ **Heave-Ho**_ and the aforementioned single is the perfect introduction to their sonic universe.

 The first thing you’ll notice is **Clubbs Coldron**‘s deep, alluring voice in heart aching electro-pop single _Wink Wink_. An ’80s inspired synth-pop ballad expertly toying with modern production techniques yet gushing with all the warm emotions of a misunderstood past. _Wink Wink_ will have you craving more; tame this hunger is by streaming/purchasing their _**Heave-Ho**_ EP at their [Bandcamp](http://abesmusic.bandcamp.com/) page.
